text: Joseph Lee Galloway (November 13, 1941 - August 18, 2021) was an American newspaper correspondent and columnist. He worked as a special consultant for the Vietnam War 50th anniversary Commemoration project run out of the Office of the Secretary of Defense and has also served as consultant to Ken Burns' production of a documentary history of the Vietnam War. He was also the former Military Affairs consultant for the Knight-Ridder chain of newspapers and was a columnist with McClatchy Newspapers.McClatchy Newspapers [Joe Galloway ] Galloway died on August 18, 2021 in Concord, North Carolina at the age of 79.'We Were Soldiers' author, war correspondent Joe Galloway dies at 79 ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American columnists Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:American war correspondents Category:Writers from Texas Category:Military people from Texas
